comments.text: Now that bug 1448428 is landing, we need to go through and fix all includes that reference `GeneratedJNIWrappers.h` and `GeneratedJNINatives.h` to just include the headers that code actually depends on.

comments.raw_text:
In this bug we're moving away from monolithic JNI headers to class-specific
headers so that we don't have to rebuild the world every time we make a change
to a JNI interface.
